query:
WITH deleted AS (
                DELETE FROM requests
                WHERE id IN (
                    SELECT r.id
                    FROM requests r
                    LEFT JOIN batches b ON r.batch_id = b.id
                    WHERE r.batch_id IS NULL OR b.deleted_at IS NOT NULL
                    LIMIT $1
                )
                RETURNING id
            )
            SELECT count(*) as "count!" FROM deleted
